item.title: p5.jsã¨Beat Detection
item.description:
å®Ÿã¯ï¼Œå…¼ã­ã¦ã‹ã‚‰JavaScriptã§çµµã‚’æãéŠã³ãŒå¥½ãã§ï¼Œãµã¨æ€ã„ãŸã¤ã¨æ›¸ã„ã¦ã¯Tumblrã«æŠ•ç¨¿ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ï¼ã“ã®ä¸­ã®å¤šãã¯p5.jsã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦æ›¸ã„ãŸï¼

éŸ³ã«åˆã‚ã›ã¦ãªã«ã‹ã‚’å‹•ã‹ã—ãŸã„

p5.jsã«ã¯p5.sound libraryã¨ã„ã†æ‹¡å¼µãŒã‚ã‚‹ï¼Web Audio APIã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹çŸ¥è­˜ã¯ã»ã¨ã‚“ã©ç„¡ã„ã‘ã©ã“ã‚Œãªã‚‰ã™ãã«è©¦ã›ãã†ï¼ã“ã‚Œã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦çµµã‚’å‹•ã‹ã—ã¦ã¿ãŸããªã£ãŸï¼

ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚ªã®å¯è¦–åŒ–ã«é–¢ã—ã¦ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®è¨˜äº‹ãŒå¤§å¤‰å‚è€ƒã«ãªã£ãŸï¼

  • Making Audio Reactive Visuals â€” Airtight Interactive

ä¸€èˆ¬çš„ã«ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹ã®4ã¤ã®è¦ç´ ãŒé‡è¦ã¨ã®ã“ã¨ï¼

  • Volume
  • Waveform
  • Level
  • Beat Detection

éŸ³ã«åˆã‚ã›ã¦å‹•ã‹ã—ãŸã„ã®ã§ï¼Œä¸Šã®è¨˜äº‹ã®Beat Detectionã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚´ãƒªã‚ºãƒ ã‚’ãã®ã¾ã¾æ‹å€Ÿï¼

  1. Volumeã®å€¤ã‚’ç›£è¦–ã™ã‚‹ï¼
  2. Volumeã®å€¤ãŒé–¾å€¤ã‚’è¶…ãˆãŸã¨ãã«Beatã¨åˆ¤å®šã—ï¼Œé–¾å€¤ã‚’Volumeã®å€¤ã§æ›´æ–°ï¼
  3. é–¾å€¤ã¯ä¸€å®šã®å‰²åˆ(Decay Rate)ã§å°ã•ããªã‚‹ï¼
  4. Beatã®ç™ºç”Ÿç›´å¾Œã®ä¸€å®šæ™‚é–“(Hold Time)ã¯é–¾å€¤ãŒæ¸›å°‘ã—ãªã„ï¼

Demo

p5.jsã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã¯ä¸‹è¨˜ï¼5ã¤ã®å‘¨æ³¢æ•°ãƒ¬ãƒ³ã‚¸æ¯ã«Volumeã®å€¤ã‚’å–å¾—ã—ã¦Beat Detectionã—ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸï¼

import p5 from 'p5'
import 'p5/lib/addons/p5.sound'
import BeatDetector from './BeatDetector'

export function sketch(p) {

  const ranges = ['bass', 'lowMid', 'mid', 'highMid', 'treble']

  let p5canvas
  let sampleSound
  let amplitude
  let fft

  let detectors = {}

  p.preload = function () {
    sampleSound = p.loadSound('assets/sample.mp3')
  }

  p.setup = function () {
    p5canvas = p.createCanvas(p.windowWidth, p.windowHeight)
    p5canvas.mouseClicked(togglePlay)

    amplitude = new p5.Amplitude()
    fft = new p5.FFT()

    sampleSound.play()

    detectors['bass'] = new BeatDetector(10, 0.85, 0.65)
    detectors['lowMid'] = new BeatDetector(30, 0.97, 0.40)
    detectors['mid'] = new BeatDetector(20, 0.90, 0.3)
    detectors['highMid'] = new BeatDetector(40, 0.97, 0.3)
    detectors['treble'] = new BeatDetector(20, 0.90, 0.15)
  }

  p.draw = function () {
    p.clear()
    p.background(0)

    fft.analyze()

    for (let i = 0; i < ranges.length; i += 1) {
      const r = ranges[i]
      const x = i * (p.width / ranges.length) + 30
      const e = fft.getEnergy(r)
      const level = e / 255.0

      const beatDetector = detectors[r]
      const isBeatDetected = beatDetector.detect(level)

      p.fill(255, 0, 0)
      drawLevelBar(x, level)

      p.fill(0, 255, 0)
      drawThreshold(x, beatDetector.cutOff)

      if (isBeatDetected) {
        p.fill(255)
        p.ellipse(x, 100, 60, 60)
      }
    }
  }

  let togglePlay = () => {
    if (sampleSound.isPlaying()) {
      sampleSound.pause()
    } else {
      sampleSound.play()
    }
  }

  let drawThreshold = (x, level) => {
    const barWidth = 60
    const maxHeight = p.height - 400
    const barHeight = p.map(level, 0, 1.0, 0, maxHeight)
    p.rect(x - 30, p.height - barHeight, barWidth, 10)
  }

  let drawLevelBar = (x, level) => {
    const barWidth = 60
    const maxHeight = p.height - 400
    const barHeight = p.map(level, 0, 1.0, 0, maxHeight)
    p.rect(x - barWidth / 2, p.height - barHeight, barWidth, barHeight)
  }
}

Observableã®å‡¦ç†ã¯ï¼Œé€šå¸¸ã¯subscribeã‚’å‘¼ã³å‡ºã—ãŸã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ã§å®Ÿè¡Œã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ï¼ ãªã®ã§Thread.sleepã¯mainã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ï¼mainã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹ã®ã¯ã‚¤ã‚±ãªã„ã“ã¨ãªã®ã§ï¼Œæ˜ç¤ºçš„ã«åˆ¥ã®ã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ã§å‡¦ç†ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¾ã™ï¼

mainã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ä»¥å¤–ã‹ã‚‰UIã«è§¦ã‚ã†ã¨ã™ã‚‹ã¨Systemã«æ€’ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ã—ã¾ã„ã¾ã™ï¼ãªã®ã§åˆ¥ã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ã§çœ ã£ã¦ã‹ã‚‰ã€ŒYO!ã€ã®é€ä¿¡ã ã‘ã‚’mainã‚¹ãƒ¬ãƒƒãƒ‰ã§è¡Œã†ã‚ˆã†ã«å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¾ã™ï¼

let observable = Observable<String>.create { observer -> Disposable in

YO!ğŸ˜ on main

ã†ã¾ãã„ãã¾ã—ãŸï¼ã“ã‚Œã§ãƒãƒ³ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚­ãƒ³ã‚°YO!YO!ãŒå¯èƒ½ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸï¼

let observable = Observable<String>.create { observer -> Disposable in

item.description:

ã¡ãªã¿ã«ç§ã¯å°‘ã—å‰ã‹ã‚‰æ©Ÿæ¢°å­¦ç¿’ã‚’ã“ãã“ãã¨å‹‰å¼·ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚¸ãƒ‹ã‚¢ã§ã™ï¼

å®Ÿé¨“ç’°å¢ƒã¯ä¸‹è¨˜ï¼

â€»ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ©ãƒ«ãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯ã¯ã§ã¦ãã¾ã›ã‚“

TensorFlowã®åŸºç¤çŸ¥è­˜

TensorFlowã¯ä¸€é€£ã®è¨ˆç®—ã‚’ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã§è¡¨ç¾ã—ã¾ã™ï¼ “Operation“ã¨å‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ãŒã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã™ï¼ Operationã¯0å€‹ä»¥ä¸Šã®è¨ˆç®—å¯¾è±¡ã‚’å—ã‘å–ã£ã¦0å€‹ä»¥ä¸Šã®è¨ˆç®—çµæœã‚’ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¾ã™ï¼ è¨ˆç®—çµæœã¨è¨ˆç®—å¯¾è±¡ã¯ï¼ŒTensor ã¨å‘¼ã°ã‚Œã‚‹å¤šæ¬¡å…ƒé…åˆ—ã§ã™ (ç‰©ç†ã‚„æ•°å­¦ã§ã®ãƒ†ãƒ³ã‚½ãƒ«ã¨åŒç¾©)ï¼ Tensorã¯ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®ã‚¨ãƒƒã‚¸ã«ç›¸å½“ã—ã¾ã™ï¼ ã“ã®Operationã‚’è¤‡æ•°ã¤ãªãåˆã‚ã›ã¦æ‰€æœ›ã®çµæœã‚’å¾—ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ï¼ ã“ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã§è¡¨ã•ã‚ŒãŸè¨ˆç®—ã‚’ï¼Œå®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ã«ã¯ï¼ŒSession ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã—ã¾ã™ï¼ ã¾ãŸï¼Œå­¦ç¿’ã®çŠ¶æ…‹ã‚’ä¿å­˜ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã«ï¼ŒVariable ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ï¼

â†“ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ãƒ‘ãƒ©ãƒ‘ãƒ©ã£ã¨è¦‹ã¦ã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’æ´ã‚€ã¨è‰¯ã•ãã†ã§ã™ï¼

  • Graph
  • Operations
  • Tensors
  • Sessions
  • Variables

Introductionã‚’ã‚„ã£ã¦ã¿ã‚‹

å…¬å¼ã®GET STARTEDã§ã¯ ä¸€æ¬¡é–¢æ•° $y = Wx + b$ ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ï¼Œ$W$ ã¨ $b$ ã‚’æœ€å°äºŒä¹—æ³•ã§æ±‚ã‚ã‚‹ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãŒå…¬é–‹ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã—ãŸï¼ ï¼ˆã¡ãªã¿ã« $W$ ã¯weight, $b$ ã¯biasã§ã™ï¼ï¼‰

ä¸Šè¿°ã®åŸºç¤çŸ¥è­˜ã‚’æ€ã„å‡ºã—ã¤ã¤ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’çœºã‚ã‚‹ã¨ï¼Œã‚„ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒå¤§ä½“ç†è§£å‡ºæ¥ã¾ã—ãŸï¼ ï¼ˆã“ã“ã§ã•ã£ã±ã‚Šã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒæ¹§ã‹ãªã„äººã¯ï¼ŒãŠãã‚‰ãæ©Ÿæ¢°å­¦ç¿’ã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹çŸ¥è­˜ãŒä¸è¶³ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã®ã§ã©ã“ã‹ã§è£œã„ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ï¼ï¼‰

Example

Exampleã®å¤šããŒMNISTã®æ‰‹æ›¸ãæ•°å­—ç”»åƒã‚’ç”¨ã„ãŸã‚‚ã®ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ï¼ ç´ æ™´ã‚‰ã—ã„Exampleãªã®ã§ã™ãŒã‚‚ã†å°‘ã—å˜ç´”ãªã‚‚ã®ã§è©¦ã—ãŸã„æ°—ã‚‚ã—ã¾ã™ï¼ ä»Šå›ã¯Iris Data Setã‚’ä½¿ã„ã¾ã™ï¼ ã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚´ãƒªã‚ºãƒ ã¯æ©Ÿæ¢°å­¦ç¿’ã§æœ€ã‚‚å˜ç´”ãªæœ€è¿‘å‚æ³•ã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¾ã™ï¼

ä¸‹è¨˜ã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã®ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’Irisç‰ˆã«æ›¸ããªãŠã—ãŸã‚‚ã®ã§ã™ï¼

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import random
import numpy as np
import tensorflow as tf
from sklearn import datasets

iris = datasets.load_iris()

n_sample = list(range(len(iris.data)))
random.seed(0)
random.shuffle(n_sample)

n_train = n_sample[:100]
n_test = n_sample[100:]

X_train = [iris.data[i] for i in n_train]
Y_train = [iris.target[i] for i in n_train]

X_test = [iris.data[i] for i in n_test]
Y_test = [iris.target[i] for i in n_test]

x_train = tf.placeholder("float", [None, 4])
x_test = tf.placeholder("float", [4])

distance = tf.reduce_sum(tf.abs(tf.add(x_train, tf.neg(x_test))), reduction_indices=1)
prediction = tf.arg_min(distance, 0)

accuracy = 0

init = tf.initialize_all_variables()

with tf.Session() as sess:
    sess.run(init)

    for i in range(len(X_test)):
        nn_index = sess.run(prediction, feed_dict={x_train: X_train, x_test: X_test[i]})
        pred = Y_train[nn_index]
        cls = Y_test[i]
        print("Test", i, "Prediction:", pred, "True Class:", cls)

        if pred == cls:
            accuracy += 1./len(X_test)
    print("Done.")
    print("Accuracy:", accuracy)

Optionsã®ä¸€è¦§ã¯å…¬å¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’ç¢ºèªã—ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ï¼

å¥èª­ç‚¹ã®é™¤å»ã‚’è¡Œã†OmitPunctuationã‚„”New York”ãªã©ã‚’ä¸€å˜èªã¨ã—ã¦æ‰±ã†JoinNamesãªã©ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼

è¤‡æ•°ã®optionã‚’æŒ‡å®šã—ãŸã„å ´åˆã¯oræ¼”ç®—|ã‚’è¡Œã„ã¾ã™ï¼

let optionsRawValue: UInt =
NSLinguisticTaggerOptions.OmitWhitespace.rawValue | NSLinguisticTaggerOptions.JoinNames.rawValue

let optionsInt = Int(optionsRawValue)
let options = NSLinguisticTaggerOptions(rawValue: optionsRawValue)

éŠã¶

ã§ã¯æœ€å¾Œã«ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ²è¼‰ã—ã¾ã™ï¼Playgroundã§ãã®ã¾ã¾å®Ÿè¡Œå‡ºæ¥ã‚‹ã¯ãšã§ã™ï¼

import Foundation

extension NSRange {
    func rangeForString(string: String) -> Range<String.Index>? {
        guard location != NSNotFound else { return nil }
        let start = string.startIndex.advancedBy(location)
        let end = string.startIndex.advancedBy(location + length)
        return start ..< end
    }
}

let sentence1 = "With great power comes great responsibility."
let sentence2 = "In critical moments, men sometimes see exactly what they wish to see."
let sentence3 = "He can make the choice that no one else can make, the right choice."

let availableSchemes = NSLinguisticTagger.availableTagSchemesForLanguage("en")
let optionsRawValue: UInt =
    NSLinguisticTaggerOptions.OmitWhitespace.rawValue | NSLinguisticTaggerOptions.JoinNames.rawValue

let tagger = NSLinguisticTagger(tagSchemes: availableSchemes, options: Int(optionsRawValue))

for sentence in [sentence1, sentence2, sentence3] {
    tagger.string = sentence

    let range = NSRange(location: 0, length: sentence.characters.count)
    tagger.enumerateTagsInRange(
        range,
        scheme: NSLinguisticTagSchemeNameTypeOrLexicalClass,
        options: NSLinguisticTaggerOptions(rawValue: optionsRawValue)) {
            tag, tokenRange, sentenceRange, stop in
            let token = sentence.substringWithRange(tokenRange.rangeForString(sentence)!)
            print("\(tag): \(token)")
    }
    print("\n")
}

Observableã®ç”Ÿæˆ

Observableã®ç”Ÿæˆã¯è¤‡æ•°ã®æ–¹æ³•ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼ create()ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã¨ã‚ã‚‰ã‚†ã‚‹ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’Observableã«ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒ—å‡ºæ¥ã¾ã™ï¼ ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«èª­ã¿æ›¸ãï¼Œãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«DBã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ï¼Œãƒãƒƒãƒˆãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚¯é€šä¿¡ã«é–¢é€£ã™ã‚‹ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã¯ã»ã¨ã‚“ã©å…¨ã¦create()ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦Observableã«å‡ºæ¥ã¾ã™ï¼

ä¾‹ãˆã°ï¼Œassetsãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã®ä¸­ã®”hoge.json”ã‹ã‚‰ãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’èª­ã¿è¾¼ã‚“ã§ãã‚‹ã¨ãã¯ã“ã‚“ãªã‚«ãƒ³ã‚¸ï¼

Observable<JSONObject> load(final Context context) {
 return Observable
   .create((OnSubscribe<AppItem>) subscriber -> {
     InputStream inputStream = null;
     BufferedReader reader = null;
     StringBuilder buf = new StringBuilder();

     try {
       inputStream = context.getAssets().open("hoge.json");
       reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(inputStream));
       String str;

       while ((str = inputStream.readLine()) != null) {
         buf.append(str);
       }
       subscriber.onNext(new JSONObject(buf.toString()));
       subscriber.onComplete();

     } catch (JSONException | IOException e) {
       subscriber.onError(e);

     } finally {
       try {
         if (inputStream != null) {
           inputStream.close();
         }
         if (reader != null) {
           reader.close();
         }
       } catch (IOException ignored) {}
     }
   });
}
